rows.label: qst700203_msg0001
rows.name:
Dekudeku not believe this! Wearing of
clothes is essential part of strategy!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0002
rows.name: Hmm? What are they arguing about?

rows.label: qst700203_msg0003
rows.name:
Merchant selling textiles in birthday
suit?! Me never seen anything like it!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0004
rows.name:
But that just Obibi's style... Is not just
fashion decision. Is way of life!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0005
rows.name:
Ah! It customers from earlier!
Good to see again!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0006
rows.name:
Is everything alright? It sounded like
the two of you were arguing...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0007
rows.name:
Oh, yes! Maybe friends can solve
dispute.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0008
rows.name:
Friends kindly ask this littlepon from
Voltis Trade Guild to assist Obibi, yes?

rows.label: qst700203_msg0009
rows.name:
Is very wise littlepon. Appreciate
much of advice.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0010
rows.name:
But this Dekudeku insist that failure
of sales lie in Obibi's court because of
clotheslessness in buff.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0011
rows.name: Is very rude of Dekudeku to suggest!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0012
rows.name: Maybe rude, but only stating facts!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0013
rows.name: Obibi show me fine array of wares.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0014
rows.name:
In terms of products, nothing to fault.
Can see much effort was put into
maintain highest standard of quality.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0015
rows.name:
Think with small push, could put out
product that steal hearts of Nopon
far and wide. Could become great hit!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0016
rows.name: But before that happen...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0017
rows.name:
Manager need to buckle up and
put some clothes on!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0018
rows.name:
Nopon who into fashion, also critical of
clothing. If manager self not wearing
anything, no reason to purchase from!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0019
rows.name:
Now, hold on a moment. You've got
a point, to be sure, but let's take a step
back and think this through carefully.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0020
rows.name:
Don't let anyone tell you how to live
your life, Obibi. You just wear what
you want to wear!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0021
rows.name:
Not everyone can be as...liberated as
you, Your Highness.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0022
rows.name: Guys! You're not helping!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0023
rows.name:
First of all, we should get down to
deciding which product it is that we
want to put out.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0024
rows.name:
If we want it to be popular, I would say
it'll need to be something trendy. What
do you think?

rows.label: qst700203_msg0025
rows.name: Perhaps?

rows.label: qst700203_msg0026
rows.name:
That said, I don't know the first thing
about Nopon fashion trends...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0027
rows.name:
Same here. I'm just going out on
a limb, really.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0028
rows.name:
So we back to square one again?!
Meh meh...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0029
rows.name: Dekudeku, was it?

rows.label: qst700203_msg0030
rows.name: Yes?

rows.label: qst700203_msg0031
rows.name:
You may only come up to our ankles,
but you're still a member of the Voltis
Trade Guild, aren't you?

rows.label: qst700203_msg0032
rows.name:
They should know better than any
of us what'll sell like hotcakes.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0033
rows.name:
Aha! We can use the Trade Guild
to gauge interest. I like it!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0034
rows.name:
Got a good head on your shoulders
there Minochi!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0035
rows.name:
OK, friends wait a moment. Let
Dekudeku have think...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0036
rows.name: Hrrrmmm...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0037
rows.name: Meh-meh?!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0038
rows.name:
Dekudeku remember now! Nopon
hats big hit recently in Voltis apparel
branch!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0039
rows.name:
And top of that, not very much Nopon
trade exist in Iira yet!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0040
rows.name:
If Obibi can corner market with
array of fine hats, maybe able to
earn bigtime profit!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0041
rows.name: Th-that sound like incredible idea!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0042
rows.name:
Obibi's Textiles actually deal in hats
before, so can make no problem!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0043
rows.name:
And if working with hats, then
customers also not so likely to have
concerns about naked manager.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0044
rows.name:
Obibi staying au naturel and proud
of it!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0045
rows.name:
Good. If we all on same page, then
should start by making test product.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0046
rows.name:
Two styles for hats in vogue at moment
is cute and casual.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0047
rows.name:
Cute style usually form of knitted
hat, adding extra touch of sweetness
to Nopon noggin.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0048
rows.name:
Casual style would be cap with
simple design, using single detail
for focal point that draw the eye.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0049
rows.name:
That rough idea, anyway. Either style
surefire hit with Nopon!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0050
rows.name:
So, to make initial hat offering,
how much stuffs in ballpark figure
Obibi expect to need?

rows.label: qst700203_msg0051
rows.name: Meh-meh... Obibi have to think on that.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0052
rows.name: Cute style and casual style...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0053
rows.name: OK! Have general idea down pat!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0054
rows.name: Blimey, that was fast!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0055
rows.name:
Must be really good at her craft.
Despite being naked...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0056
rows.name:
Going to list off materials needed for
hat-making, so please to careful listen.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0057
rows.name: First, for cute-trim knit hat...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0058
rows.name:
Will require 4 Cotton Branches,
2 sprigs of Angel's Sage, and
1 Sunflower Rogue!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0059
rows.name: Then, for casual-trim cap...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0060
rows.name:
Need 4 Corkscrew Creepers, 3 Panda
Pansies, and 1 heap of Floral Soil!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0061
rows.name:
These resources only found in Iira
and Gula, so friends will have to
search both places to get hands on.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0062
rows.name:
Think that concludes business here
for now.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0063
rows.name:
All left is for friends to gather
necessary materials!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0064
rows.name:
First thing first is to produce hats
and get business back on feet!
